import style from '../style/LeftsideNotas.module.css' function LeftSideNotas() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(true); const [totales, setTotales] = useState({ ingreso: 0, egreso: 0, total: 0 }); const toggleContainer = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
{isOpen && ( <>

Su dinero:

${formatNumber(totales.total)}

Ingresos

${formatNumber(totales.ingreso)}

Egresos

${formatNumber(totales.egreso)}

Total

${formatNumber(totales.total)}

)}
) } export default LeftSideNotas
